faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How much does a water softener cost?
faq.a1: Water softeners range from €400 to €2,000 depending on type and home size. For a typical four-person household, expect €800–€1,200. You'll receive a detailed quote with no obligation.
faq.q2: How much can I save annually?
faq.a2: Average savings are €400–€1,200 per year (depending on home size and system type). Your softener also protects appliances from damage, adding to the savings.
faq.a3: A typical water softener installation takes 3–5 hours. Heating systems may require 1–3 days depending on size. We'll provide exact timing during the diagnostic visit.
faq.a4: Yes — 5 years on labor and 2–5 years on equipment (depending on type). We also offer post-warranty service for €50–€80 annually.
faq.a5: Emergencies: YES — 24/7 via WhatsApp. Scheduled installations: Monday–Friday, 8:00 AM–5:00 PM. For urgent cases, call us — we mobilize quickly.
faq.stillQuestion: Still have questions? Call or text us on WhatsApp.
